author: Keegan Hamilton, Courtney Brooks
title: Sick Staff, Inmate Transfers, and No Tests: How the U.S. Is Failing Federal Inmates as Coronavirus Hits
description: “We pray it’s not here, but to be honest nobody really knows.”
content:
Federal prison guards warn that a coronavirus outbreak is looming and could be catastrophic, causing mass chaos in a correctional system responsible for more than 175,000 inmates across the United States.
 VICE News spoke with correctional officers at multip… [+10036 chars]
